name: Path of the Storm Herald
description: Storm Heralds channel the raw fury of elemental storms, surrounding themselves with a raging aura of desert heat, ocean lightning, or frozen tundra winds.

3.name: Storm Aura
3.description: When you enter a rage, you activate a storm aura centered on you. Choose one environment.

options.name: Desert
options.description: Each creature of your choice in the aura takes fire damage.

options.name: Sea
options.description: Choose one creature in the aura; it must make a Dexterity saving throw or take lightning damage.

options.name: Tundra
options.description: Each creature of your choice in the aura gains temporary hit points.

6.name: Storm Soul
6.description: You gain resistance or immunity to environmental effects associated with your chosen storm aura.

10.name: Shielding Storm
10.description: You extend the benefits of your Storm Soul to allies within your storm aura.

14.name: Raging Storm
14.description: Your storm reacts violently when creatures enter or attack within your aura, producing powerful elemental effects based on your environment.
